dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of images of hands displaying various signs of the American Sign Language (ASL) alphabet, compiled to assist in the recognition and translation of ASL in real-time applications.
dcterms:title: American Sign Language (ASL) alphabet dataset

dcterms:description: Various free datasets for ASL were mentioned, but they lacked quality and curation, prompting the authors to create their own dataset.
dcterms:title: Various free datasets for ASL
